originalText.text: I lived in one of Shalimar's properties, 540 West 50th Street, for 3 years. The super of the building (Cirlo) was one of the most attentive, helpful, and resourceful supers in the city. The property manager, Cassandra, has always been overly responsive to all e-mails and correspondences. Cassandra made sure our AC and stove were properly replaced when broken, and she ensured all payments and our deposit was received properly. Thank you Cassandra, Cirlo, and Shalimar for making my experience living in your building so amazing.

originalText.text: BEWARE STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!!!! most horrible place to live in or get anything done , worse management company in the world!!!! Casandra incompetence is mind boggling and has the worse attitude ... truly horrible experience and somewhat traumatized me
